Summary: Several orange lights coming over the horizon and then turning or vanishing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around November 25th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsHad gone outside at approx 7:30 PM to fill my outdoor wood furnace for the night. When I leave the house am facing east. I immediately saw several orange lights at various heights above the horizon moving in my direction. They were separated from each other and as I watched more would move into view. I took them to be a group of helicopters but never heard a sound. Rather then continuing on over head they eventually moved to the north and soon after that the lights were not visible. This happened well short of the horizon. Guessing in all there was around 8-10 of these over the course of 5-10 minutes. At the closest the best way I can describe it would be like a road flare seen off in the distant with more of a floating action then a direct flight like an airplane would have. I didn`t notice any planes in the night sky until after I lost sight of the last one but likely there was. One was flying over at that point from the southwest to the northeast.
